nodes.name: Substance
nodes.description: Represents chemical substances being studied, uniquely identified by their DTXSID. These nodes contain alternative identifiers like CASRN (Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number), structure-based identifiers like InChI and InChI keys, and use classifications.

properties.name: DTXSID
properties.description: Unique identifier for the substance. The DSSTox substance identifier (DTXSID) originates from the Environmental Protection Agency CompTox Dashboard.

properties.name: casrn
properties.description: Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number of the substance.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Common name of the substance.

properties.name: inchi
properties.description: The International Chemical Identifier (InChI) is a textual identifier for chemical substances, designed to provide a standard way to encode molecular information and to facilitate the search for such information in databases and on the web.

properties.name: inchiKey
properties.description: The InChIKey, sometimes referred to as a hashed InChI, is a fixed length (27 character) condensed digital representation of the InChI that is not human-understandable.

properties.name: IN_REACH
properties.description: Indicator whether the substance is registered in REACH (Registration, Evaluation, Authorisation, and Restriction of Chemicals) and therefore registered for regulation by the European Union.

properties.name: use_groups
properties.description: Use group classification for the substance. These annotations for substances are extracted from the publication by Lena Kramer et al. in 2024 with the title Curated mode-of-action data and effect concentrations for chemicals relevant for the aquatic environment, available at https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/38200014/.

properties.name: use_groups_N
properties.description: Number of use groups the substance belongs to.

nodes.name: Species
nodes.description: Represents different biological species being impacted by substances. Each species is identified by its common name and includes its taxonomic classification.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Common name of the species. Available values are algae, crustacean, and fish.

properties.name: classification
properties.description: Taxonomic classification of the species. Available values are unicelluar with algae as representative, invertebrate with crustacean as representative, and vertebrate with fish as representative.

nodes.name: Site
nodes.description: Represents geographic locations where environmental measurements are taken. Each site is identified by its name and contains geographic coordinates (longitude, latitude), country, water body, and river basin information.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the sampling site. This is also referred to as sampling site, site, place, or location.

properties.name: lon
properties.description: Longitude of the site location. The longitude is stored in decimal coordinates.

properties.name: lat
properties.description: Latitude of the site location. The latitude is stored in decimal coordinates.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The name of the country where the site is located.

properties.name: water_body
properties.description: Water body associated with the site. This can be a small stream, a stream, a river, or a lake.

properties.name: river_basin
properties.description: The river basin is the area associated with the site or water body where all flowing surface water of different water bodies converges to a single one. In case of a single water body, the river basin has the same name as the water body.

relationships.name: MEASURED_AT
relationships.description: Connects a Substance to a Site, representing a measurement event where the concentration of the substance was recorded at a specific site and time. Includes properties like concentration values and Toxic Units for various species. Measured concentrations are summarized as mean and median concentration values aggregating multiple measurements at different time points for the same Substance and Site pair.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique key for the measurement event.

properties.name: time_point
properties.description: Timestamp of the measurement event.

properties.name: year
properties.description: Year when the measurement occurred.

properties.name: quarter
properties.description: Quarter of the year when the measurement occurred.

properties.name: median_concentration
properties.description: Median concentration of the substance measured at a site across one or more measurement timestamps.

properties.name: mean_concentration
properties.description: Mean concentration of the substance measured at a site across one or more measurement timestamps.

properties.name: concentration_unit
properties.description: Unit of the concentration (e.g., mg/L).

properties.name: TU_crustacean
properties.description: Toxic Unit for crustaceans. This value has been calculated from the ratio of the median measured concentration and the tox value of this substance towards crustacean.

properties.name: TU_fish
properties.description: Toxic Unit for fish.This value has been calculated from the ratio of the median measured concentration and the tox value of this substance towards fish.

properties.name: TU_algae
properties.description: Toxic Unit for algae. This value has been calculated from the ratio of the median measured concentration and the tox value of this substance towards algae.

relationships.name: TESTED_FOR_TOXICITY
relationships.description: Links a Substance to a Species, representing a toxicity test for the species. It includes toxicity values and chemical properties like the neutral fraction for the substance. The neutral fraction needs to be multiplied to the toxicity value, if this value has been predicted by a QSAR (Quantitative structureâ€“activity relationship) model.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique key for the toxicity test.

properties.name: tox_value_mg_L
properties.description: Toxicity value for a given substance in mg/L for the species. This value can be used to calculate the toxic unit (TU) given a measured concentration of this substance.

properties.name: neutral_fraction_jchem
properties.description: Neutral fraction based on JChem calculations.

relationships.name: IS_DRIVER
relationships.description: Connects a Substance to a Site, indicating that the substance is a key driver of risk for a particular species at that site. In particular, we consider a substance as driver if its toxic unit (TU) contributes to the upper 75 % of the cumulative risk, the sum of the TUs of all measured substances at at site. Includes information on the species affected, time of the original measurement which was used to compute the individual TU, and the importance of the substance as a driver.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique key for the driver relation.

properties.name: species
properties.description: Species affected by the substance.

properties.name: time_point
properties.description: Time point for when the substance was determined as a driver. This reflects the measurement timestamp.

properties.name: year
properties.description: Year when the substance was determined as a driver.

properties.name: quarter
properties.description: Quarter of the year when the substance was determined as a driver.

properties.name: driver_importance
properties.description: Driver importance score for the substance.

relationships.name: SUMMARIZED_IMPACT_ON
relationships.description: Connects a Site to a Species, summarizing the cumulative toxic impact of all substances on that species at the site. All individual toxic unit (TU) values are summed up to form the sumTU. Properties include the sum of Toxic Units, maximum Toxic Unit, and the ratio of Toxic Units.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique key for the summarized impact relation.

properties.name: time_point
properties.description: Timestamp for the summarized impact.

properties.name: year
properties.description: Year when the summarized impact was recorded.

properties.name: quarter
properties.description: Quarter of the year when the summarized impact was recorded.

properties.name: sumTU
properties.description: Sum of Toxic Units of all TUs from all substances measured at the site at the timestamp and for the species.

properties.name: maxTU
properties.description: Observed maximum Toxic Unit of all TUs from all substances measured at the site at the timestamp and for the species.

properties.name: ratioTU
properties.description: Ratio of the maxTU and sumTU. This can be used as an indicator if only a single substance drives the risk at this site and time - then this value is 1 or if multiple substances are involved in driving the risk - then this value is below 1.
